Name: Snckbr
Review Text: We had a vegan surprise menu, by far the best vegan food I've had in a restaurant in ages. The chocolate cake we had for dessert was out of this world!! Definitely worth the money and will be going back.

Name: Snckbr
Review Text: The food was excellent. They have lots of vegetarian options but also really good meat which is odd - catering to both groups. Really creative menu. But two things: it's not cheap and the service is slow.

Name: Snckbr
Review Text: Entered drunk and hungry. Was initially disappointed by the menu listing not-fried-fries and light mayonnaise, but ended up having one of the best burgers I ever had with great not-fried-fries and delicious light-mayonnaise. Service was very fast and friendly and helpful. Will return.

Name: Snckbr
Review Text: Extremely healthy tasting food. You can eat a ton, and still feel clean, guilt-free and holy. Very conservative with their seasonings, in favour of brining out the natural flavours of ingredients - which sometimes work brilliantly and sometimes just bland. Smoothies: rabbit-like. Octopussy: great, delicate, full of meaty juiciness.
